sentences.sContent: A number of black youths have complained of being harassed by the police.
sentences.sCn: 一些黑人青年投诉称受到警察骚扰。

synos.tran: 使困扰；使烦恼；反复袭击

remMethod.val: “好扰死” → 好烦扰啊， 都烦死了 → 烦扰

trans.tranOther: to make someone’s life unpleasant, for example by frequently saying offensive things to them or threatening them
